intro.para: Welcome to CoreLify: organize habits, finances and collaboration.

hero.title: CoreLify
hero.subtitle: The future of personal and group management

card1.title: Simplicity and accessibility
card1.text: CoreLify offers an intuitive and accessible interface. Our features cover the essentials to organize habits, finances, and teamwork without unnecessary complexity.

card2.title: Power
card2.text: At the same time, CoreLify is a powerful tool for managing habits and finances, designed for both individual users and groups.

card3.title: Communication and versatility
card3.text: CoreLify is not just a private space; it also includes group collaboration options and communication tools built for effective coordination.

screen1.title: Easy to use!
screen1.text: Sign up in just a few steps, access your data, and get clear insights in minutes.

screen2.title: Protect your information!
screen2.text: Manage your data securely. Access analysis tools and configurable alerts to help you stay in control.

screen3.title: Track your activities!
screen3.text: Our system lets you add descriptions and images to your activities and measure the time spent on each one —individually or in groups— with an integrated timer.

news.title: Sign up for updates!
news.text: Subscribe to receive news about updates and improvements to the app.

rightContainer.intro: Many people struggle to organize different aspects of their lives: personal habits, finances, and group coordination. While some apps address one of these areas, few bring them all together in a single experience. From that gap, CoreLify was born.
rightContainer.feat1: It only requires an internet connection for the features that truly need it. Enjoy a simple, efficient, and elegant app designed to avoid overwhelming tools.
rightContainer.feat2: CoreLify is an integrated, collaborative, and flexible space, adaptable to both individual and group situations.
rightContainer.feat3: Track your habits, prioritize activities, and connect them with the time and financial resources you invest. Receive reports and easy-to-read charts to make better decisions.
